thought: To craft a smoker, I need to place a furnace in the middle of the crafting grid and a stripped_jungle_wood above it. The furnace is in slot 36, so I will move it to slot 5 (the middle of the crafting grid). The stripped_jungle_wood is in slot 32, so I will move it to slot 2 (above the middle of the crafting grid).
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1
